questions.text: Which subjects did you enjoy the most at school:
In your free time you can be found...
labels: ... realising your artistic passion by drawing / dancing / playing an instrument
... playing or making your own computer games. Coding is a lifestyle, not a hobby.
... training for your next athletic challenge. You love moving around and being outdoors.
... in your garage tinkering on your latest project, whether it be a new car, a bike or a 3D printer
